body.name: Everyone Nourishing Hand and Body Lotion, 32 Ounce (Pack of 2), Coconut and Lemon, Plant-Based Lotion with Pure Essential Oils, Coconut Oil, Aloe Vera and Vitamin E
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: Contains: (2) 32 Ounce 100% Recycled Plastic Bottles of Everyone Nourishing Coconut and Lemon Hand and Body Lotion. For a limited time, you may receive either bottle while we update our packaging. New Look, Same Great Product

Scent: Everyone Coconut and Lemon Lotion combines the upbeat burst of lemon with the tropical relaxation of sweet coconut for a blend that will make you feel like you're about to jump into an aromatic pool. You’ll feel more energized, positive, and ready to go

Use: Our Nourishing Lotion is the ultimate tool for smoother skin. This bright and uplifting lotion is light enough for your face, but moisturizing enough for your hands and body. With the upbeat aromatic appeal of lemon and sweet coconut, keeping your skin soft and supple will feel like a seamless treat
Clean Promise: Everyone Nourishing Lotion is EWG verified, GMO free, cruelty free, gluten free, paraben free, triclosan free, and synthetic fragrance free
Zero Waste Mission: In 2019, we diverted 90% of our waste from landfills. Our packaging is made from recycled material. We always use 100% recyclable packaging for order shipping, too
body.description: Meet a real multitasker. Everyone 2in1 Nourishing Lotions are light enough for the delicate skin on your face and moisturizing enough for hands and everywhere else. Made from natural botanicals and organic ingredients, this EWG verified lotion is safe for the entire family. We combine skin-loving ingredients such as vegetable glycerin, coconut and sesame seed oils, with our organic herbal blend of aloe vera, calendula, chamomile, and white tea extracts that provide long-lasting hydration thats deeply moisturizing but quick to absorb with no greasy residue (yuck). At EO Products, we believe the best resources come from nature. That is why we are committed to our zero-waste mission. Our products are always made with reduction and repurposing in mind, this includes our recyclable packaging. Since 1995, we've made our products from domestic and imported ingredients in our family-owned and -operated factory in San Rafael, California. We learned early on that the only way to meet our own high standards was to take responsibility for everything ourselves. From our family to yours, enjoy.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: #EveryoneCares Everyone has been putting the care into body care products since 2012. We believe that all families deserve the best for their bodies, that's why we use plant-based ingredients. Prioritizing People + Planet We say YEP to botanical extracts and pure essential oils, and NOPE to animal testing, synthetic fragrances, parabens, dyes and phthalates. 100% Recycled Bottle Our bottles are now made from previously-used recycled plastic, with a dark amber color that keeps UV rays away from the natural ingredients inside.
Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars i didnt want to let this go
reviews.reviewText: Now I really loved the smell and the feel of this body lotion. I got two of the large bottles because Coconut and lemon are two of my favorite scents. Reminds me of summer days at the beach and that is heaven. The scent is not strong or over powering, subtle but nice. Fresh and perky. This lotion is not heavy, not greasy, soaks in quickly and feels like silk on your skin. After continued use, it was then I found I could not use sesame oil. Which is one of these ingredients. And Im heartbroken. Everything I needed but one little culprit. I am now on one more arduous journey to find the moisturizer that works for my temperamental skin. If this is not your issue, you are lucky. This is a great lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fragrant, uplifting, smooth
reviews.reviewText: This is where a moisturizer meets luxury & affordability. The scent always demands a deep second breath when I apply it & it always brightens my day, not to mention soothes my skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not greasy; smells great, Works!
reviews.reviewText: This smells like my Mom’s snickerdoodle lemon cookies. OMGOODNESS good smell. Light not sticky or greasy, goes quickly into the skin. I knit, so this is perfect, no residue on my yarn. Also none of the BAD chemicals either; perfect. Best lotion ever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used this for years
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used this lotion for a really long time unfortunately it just keeps going up in price, I just keep buying it. It helps my skin tremendously. I think the Lavender is my favorite just a really nice scent and not overwhelming. It is not greasy whatsoever, does a good job of getting into my skin, it must be the essential oils, whatever it is it does work for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars EWG verified and a great fragrance
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited to try this lotion as it is ewg verified and lemon is one of my favorite scents. I was very disappointed in the delivery of the product. The top was not attached properly on one of the bottles and lotion was spilled inside the box and on the other bottle. Not a good experience.On a positive note, the lotion has a great fragrance, is thick and creamy, and seems to work well at first application.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non-greasy, moisturizing and smells great.
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion. It smells great, is not greasy and absorbs quickly. My skin stays moisturized all day. I have also used the unscented version but prefer to have the wonderful coconut lemon scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non Toxic & Affordable
reviews.reviewText: Love this EWG verified lotion! Very affordable, smells good & works well. My first bottle had leaked, which was a bummer. Just bought more, for my DIL. And I was happy to see the improved packaging should basically eliminate the chance for leaking/opened bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great safe lotion for the whole family. Lasts a long time. Scent is nice, not too overpowering. Great everyday after shower lotion. Bottle is 100% post consumer recycled plastic, bonus!
Not too heavy, absorbs well. Really nice, soft scent. By far my favourite body lotion. Leaves skin so smooth and glowy.

Love the smell , great moisturizer for young and old .great product .I purchased it first at a store , afterwords was no longer available.glad to have found it on Amazon .the price was fair .this was purchased as 2 together a set .which made it more affordable.compared to other sellers this seller offered this item at good price .my sister likes this .so do I .thanks Amazon thanks seller for keeping this at a price where more customers can enjoy it .
La textura y el olor de esta crema son deliciosos. Es mi humectante favorito. Desearía que volvieran a surtirla (por favor!).
Smells like real lavender not like most products

reviews.reviewTitle: Good product, awful packing for shipping
reviews.reviewText: Love the lotion but the packing sucked on the two pack. I also purchased one individual bottle which was shipped with the pump taped down so it didn't explode. Thankfully the two pack was thrown into its own plastic bag inside the shipment, otherwise everything would have been covered in lotion
